moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accidents
    Our attorneys understand an auto accident can change your life. Medical bills and other resulting expenses can be a huge burden on you and those you care about.
  • Pedestrian Accidents
    Our lawyers know that even though laws are in place to protect pedestrians, drivers still speed, drive recklessly, lose control of their vehicles, and fail to obey traffic laws, putting pedestrians at serious risk for injury.
  • Wrongful Death
    Our firm can help you understand the wrongful death laws and your rights in a wrongful death claim.
  • Employment Discrimination
    Our attorneys can assist victims of age, disability, race and religious discrimination.
  • Product Liability
    Our experienced product liability lawyers can help individuals prosecute reckless or negligent manufacturers of defective or mislabeled products.

description:
Denver Trial Lawyers Fighting For The Victims Of Workplace Discrimination

For many people, the thought of taking legal action against an employer for allowing or encouraging a hostile work environment can be quite intimidating. At Bachus & Schanker, LLC, however, our team of aggressive trial attorneys can level the playing field and fight to protect your rights. We can give you a voice.

From our law firm in Denver, Colorado, and in state and federal trial courts throughout the United States, our seasoned team of employment law attorneys represents employees in matters related to:

  • Wage and hour disputes
  • Wrongful termination
  • Workplace discrimination
  • Family and Medical Leave Act disputes
  • Severance agreement and employment contract review

Our lawyers have successfully handled large class-action lawsuits in federal court on behalf of employees who were being taken advantage of by their employers. We do not shy from a fight, and we will not hesitate to take your case to trial if it is necessary to help you maximize the compensation that you deserve.

One Of Colorado's Premier Law Firms For Plaintiffs

Bachus & Schanker, LLC, was first established to fight for compensation on behalf of accident victims. We have since grown to represent plaintiffs in all manner of cases, including personal injury, defective medical devises and drugs, workers' compensation, Social Security Disability, workplace discrimination, and overtime and wage claims.

As our client, you can have peace of mind knowing that you are being represented by a law firm with the experience, resources and skills to effectively represent you. With 18 trial lawyers, a staff of over 60 team members along with state-of-the-art facilities that include a full courtroom to help clients prepare for trials, we are well-equipped to handle the most complex litigation.

If you have been injured due to someone's negligence, or your employer, an insurance company, a corporation or a government agency is taking advantage of you, we want to hear from you. Contact Bachus & Schanker, LLC, today at 866-805-5348 to schedule a free consultation with an attorney who knows how to get positive results for you.
